jobDescription: Samsung is seeking a passionate and collaborative Data Scientist to join our Health team in Mountain View, CA.  As a cross-disciplinary Health-focused product development team consisted of research, technology, design, strategy and product functions, we define the next generation of Health services experiences for Samsung products.  Learn more by clicking here: http://www.samsung.com/global/galaxy/apps/samsung-health/  As a Data Scientist, you will work very closely with the product team, marketing team and the UX team to help evaluate and provide insights related to promotion performance, product priority, UI/UX effective and user satisfaction. You will be also be expected to develop algorithms to improve the effectiveness of the promotions and customize user experience. If you love working directly on large scale consumer-facing products, wed love to meet you.
